item.title: how long is the linux kernel, in miles?
item.description: So, if we count the bytes in each .h, .s, and .c file what do we get? find . -iname '*.c' -o -iname '*.h' -o -iname '*.s' -exec wc -c {} \; \ | ruby -n -e \ "puts ARGF.reduce(0) { |acc,val| acc + val.split.first.chomp.to_i }" # 9190080(12 + 2) / 300.0 * 9190080 / 12.0 / 5280.0 px font + px kerning / dpi * characters / foot / mile Approximately 6.
